option.name: left_handed_mode
option._long: Switches the deviceâ€™s functionality to be more accommodating for left-handed users.

option.name: modifier_binding_timeout
option._long: Cancels modifier actions (like `Super` for the `expo` plugin) when held for the specified timeout (in milliseconds). Setting the value to **0** never cancels.

option.name: kb_repeat_delay
option._long: Sets the amount of time a key must be held before it starts repeating.

option.name: kb_repeat_rate
option._long: Sets the frequency of key repeats once the `input.kb_repeat_delay` has passed.

option.name: kb_numlock_default_state
option._long: Default numlock state when wayfire starts.

option.name: kb_capslock_default_state
option._long: Default capslock state when wayfire starts.

option.name: xkb_layout
option._long: Sets the layout of the keyboard, like `us` or `fr`. Multiple layouts can be specified by separating them with commas.

option.name: xkb_model
option._long: Sets the model of the keyboard. This has an influence for some extra keys your keyboard might have.

option.name: xkb_options
option._long: Sets extra XKB configuration options for the keyboard. Multiple options can be specified by separating them with commas.

option.name: xkb_rules
option._long: Sets files of rules to be used for keyboard mapping composition.

option.name: xkb_variant
option._long: Sets the variant of the keyboard, like `dvorak` or `colemak`.

option.name: middle_emulation
option._long: Enables middle button emulation by hitting the left and right buttons simultaneously.

option.name: mouse_accel_profile
option._long: Sets the pointer acceleration profile.

option.name: mouse_cursor_speed
option._long: Changes the pointer acceleration.

option.name: mouse_scroll_speed
option._long: Changes the mouse scroll factor. Scroll speed will be scaled by the given value, which must be non-negative.

option.name: touchpad_accel_profile
option._long: Sets the touchpad acceleration profile.

option.name: tap_to_click
option._long: Enables or disables tap-to-click.

option.name: click_method
option._long: Changes the click method.

option.name: scroll_method
option._long: Changes the scroll method.

option.name: disable_touchpad_while_typing
option._long: Disables the touchpad while typing.

option.name: disable_touchpad_while_mouse
option._short: Disable touchpad while using the mouse
option._long: Disables the touchpad while using the mouse.

option.name: natural_scroll
option._long: Enables or disables natural (inverted) scrolling.

option.name: touchpad_cursor_speed
option._long: Changes the touchpad acceleration.

option.name: gesture_sensitivity
option._long: Change the sensitivity of the built-in gesture detection. Higher values mean that less finger movement is required to trigger the gesture.

option.name: touchpad_scroll_speed
option._long: Changes the touchpad scroll factor. Scroll speed will be scaled by the given value, which must be non-negative.

option.name: cursor_theme
option._long: Overrides the system default `XCursor` theme.

option.name: cursor_size
option._long: Overrides the system default `XCursor` size.
